description: This file is a shell script for configuring network interfaces, hostapd settings, bridge configurations, and web server parameters in a network device setup, particularly for setting up bridge mode Wi-Fi interfaces with private SSID hiding, IP configuration, and traffic forwarding.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service by bringing down and up specific WLAN interfaces and killing existing hostapd processes.
